mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_MEM (GROUP_MEM_PACKAGE_PK, GROUP_MEM_RESERVE_ID, GROUP_MEM_ID, GROUP_MEM_NAME, GROUP_MEM_AGE, GROUP_MEM_GENDER, GROUP_MEM_STATUS) VALUES(#{group_mem_package_pk}, #{group_mem_reserve_id}, #{group_mem_id}, #{group_mem_name}, #{group_mem_age}, #{group_mem_gender}, 0)

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GROUP_MEM WHERE GROUP_MEM_PACKAGE_PK = #{group_mem_package_pk} AND GROUP_MEM_RESERVE_ID = #{group_mem_reserve_id}
